title: Vazhkai Oru lyrics Inidhu Inidhu lyrics
stanzas:
Singer  :  Karthik
Song    :  Vazhkai Oru
Movie :   Inidhu Inidhu
Lyrics :  Vairamuthu

Vazhkai Oru vaanam pola, Uravu adhil megam pola
Natpu mattum suriyan pola, Nanban Vazhga
Petravargal arindhadhai vidavum, Matravargal therindhadhai vidavum
Mutrum ennai purindhadhu natpu, Natpu vazhga

Aanum pennum pennum aanum ,kaakum karpu nalla natpu.
Vaaaaa thozha . Oh my friend
Ennai manushi endra mudhal manidan nee.
Vaaaa thozhi . Oh my friend
Ennai manidan endra mudhal manushi nee.

Megakootil thuzhigalanom, Ingu vandhu nadhigalanom.
Orumai ingae panmaiyanom, Panmaikoodi orumaiyanom.
Minnal vandhal megam kooda kizhindu pogum
Vaanam endrum kizhithal illaiye .

Vaanam pole engal natpu vazhndhirukkume.
Maalai nizhal pol valarum bandham
Mayangi mayangi magilum nenjam.

Kallai pola arpamanen, natpinale sirpamanen
Netruvarayil pulliyanen, ungalale varthaiyanen.
Konda acham koocham vittu odivittadhey.
Idhu anbin nanmai thandhadhey .
Nenjil vanjam varmam ella marivittadhey.

Paarai manasu pazhuthuvittadhey .
Bandham pasam purindhu vittathey.
